verses.verse: תְּפִלָּ֗ה <S%H8605><s%> te-fil-Lah, A Prayer לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> le-Da-Vid of David הַטֵּֽה־ <S%H5186><s%> hat-teh- Bow down יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD אָזְנְךָ֣ <S%H241><s%> 'a-ze-ne-Cha thine ear עֲנֵ֑נִי <S%H6030><s%> 'a-Ne-ni; hear כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For עָנִ֖י <S%H6041><s%> 'a-Ni me for I [am] poor וְאֶבְי֣וֹן <S%H34><s%> ve-'ev-Yon and needy אָֽנִי׃ <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni. I

שָֽׁמְרָ֣ה <S%H8104><s%> sha-me-Rah Preserve נַפְשִׁי֮ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi my soul כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- I am a חָסִ֪יד <S%H2623><s%> cha-Sid for I [am] holy אָ֥נִי <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni I הוֹשַׁ֣ע <S%H3467><s%> ho-Sha' save עַ֭בְדְּךָ <S%H5650><s%> 'Av-de-cha thy servant אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You אֱלֹהַ֑י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai; O thou my God הַבּוֹטֵ֥חַ <S%H982><s%> hab-bo-Te-ach that trusteth אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha. about

חָנֵּ֥נִי <S%H2603><s%> chon-ne-ni Be merciful אֲדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai; unto me O Lord כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֵלֶ֥יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha to אֶ֝קְרָ֗א <S%H7121><s%> 'ek-Ra, for I cry כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom. unto thee daily

שַׂ֭מֵּחַ <S%H8055><s%> me-ach Rejoice נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh the soul עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> 'av-De-cha; of thy servant כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֵלֶ֥יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha to אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai, for unto thee O Lord נַפְשִׁ֥י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi my soul אֶשָּֽׂא׃ <S%H5375><s%> 'es-Sa. do I lift up

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You אֲ֭דֹנָי <S%H136><s%> 'A-do-nai For thou Lord ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov [art] good וְסַלָּ֑ח <S%H5546><s%> ve-sal-Lach; and ready to forgive וְרַב־ <S%H7227><s%> ve-rav- and plenteous חֶ֝֗סֶד <S%H2617><s%> Che-sed, in mercy לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol to all קֹרְאֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H7121><s%> ko-re-'Ei-cha. unto all them that call

הַאֲזִ֣ינָה <S%H238><s%> ha-'a-Zi-nah Give ear יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD תְּפִלָּתִ֑י <S%H8605><s%> te-fil-la-Ti; unto my prayer וְ֝הַקְשִׁ֗יבָה <S%H7181><s%> ve-hak-Shi-vah, and attend בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> be-Kol to the voice תַּחֲנוּנוֹתָֽי׃ <S%H8469><s%> ta-cha-nu-no-Tai. of my supplications

בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom In the day צָ֭רָתִ֥י <S%H6869><s%> tza-ra-Ti of my trouble אֶקְרָאֶ֗ךָּ <S%H7121><s%> 'ek-ra-'E-ka, I will call כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for תַעֲנֵֽנִי׃ <S%H6030><s%> ta-'a-Ne-ni. upon thee for thou wilt answer

אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> 'ein- There כָּמ֖וֹךָ <S%H3644><s%> ka-Mo-cha like בָאֱלֹהִ֥ים׀ <S%H430><s%> va-'E-lo-Him Among the gods אֲדֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai, [there is] none like unto thee O Lord וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein is no כְּֽמַעֲשֶֽׂיךָ׃ <S%H4639><s%> Ke-ma-'a-Sei-cha. neither [are there any works] like unto thy works

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All גּוֹיִ֤ם׀ <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim All nations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom עָשִׂ֗יתָ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ta, whom thou hast made יָב֤וֹאוּ׀ <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo-'u shall come וְיִשְׁתַּחֲו֣וּ <S%H7812><s%> ve-yish-ta-cha-Vu and worship לְפָנֶ֣יךָ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nei-cha before אֲדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai; thee O Lord וִֽיכַבְּד֣וּ <S%H3513><s%> vi-chab-be-Du and shall glorify לִשְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8034><s%> lish-Me-cha. thy name

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for גָד֣וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol For thou [art] great אַ֭תָּה <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah you וְעֹשֵׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> ve-'o-Seh and doest נִפְלָא֑וֹת <S%H6381><s%> nif-la-'ot; wondrous things אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him thou [art] God לְבַדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H905><s%> le-vad-De-cha. alone

ה֘וֹרֵ֤נִי <S%H3384><s%> ho-Re-ni Teach יְהוָ֨ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD דַּרְכֶּ֗ךָ <S%H1870><s%> dar-Ke-cha, me thy way אֲהַלֵּ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> 'a-hal-Lech I will walk בַּאֲמִתֶּ֑ךָ <S%H571><s%> ba-'a-mit-Te-cha; in thy truth יַחֵ֥ד <S%H3161><s%> ya-Ched unite לְ֝בָבִ֗י <S%H3824><s%> le-va-Vi, my heart לְיִרְאָ֥ה <S%H3372><s%> le-yir-'Ah to fear שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8034><s%> she-Me-cha. thy name

אוֹדְךָ֤׀ <S%H3034><s%> 'od-Cha I will praise אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai thee O Lord אֱ֭לֹהַי <S%H430><s%> 'E-lo-hai my God בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all לְבָבִ֑י <S%H3824><s%> le-va-Vi; with all my heart וַאֲכַבְּדָ֖ה <S%H3513><s%> va-'a-chab-be-Dah and I will glorify שִׁמְךָ֣ <S%H8034><s%> shim-Cha thy name לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam. for evermore

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For חַ֭סְדְּךָ <S%H2617><s%> Chas-de-cha [is] thy mercy גָּד֣וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol For great עָלָ֑י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai; toward וְהִצַּ֥לְתָּ <S%H5337><s%> ve-hitz-Tzal-ta toward me and thou hast delivered נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi, my soul מִשְּׁא֥וֹל <S%H7585><s%> mish-she-'ol hell תַּחְתִּיָּֽה׃ <S%H8482><s%> tach-ti-Yah. from the lowest

אֱלֹהִ֤ים׀ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him O God זֵ֘דִ֤ים <S%H2086><s%> ze-Dim the proud קָֽמוּ־ <S%H6965><s%> ka-mu- are risen עָלַ֗י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai, against וַעֲדַ֣ת <S%H5712><s%> va-'a-Dat against me and the assemblies עָ֭רִיצִים <S%H6184><s%> 'A-ri-tzim of violent בִּקְשׁ֣וּ <S%H1245><s%> bik-Shu [men] have sought נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi; after my soul וְלֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo have not שָׂמ֣וּךָ <S%H7760><s%> sa-Mu-cha and have not set לְנֶגְדָּֽם׃ <S%H5048><s%> le-neg-Dam. before

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah O אֲ֭דֹנָי <S%H136><s%> 'A-do-nai But thou O Lord אֵל־ <S%H410><s%> 'el- [art] a God רַח֣וּם <S%H7349><s%> ra-Chum full of compassion וְחַנּ֑וּן <S%H2587><s%> ve-chan-Nun; and gracious אֶ֥רֶךְ <S%H750><s%> 'E-rech Slow אַ֝פַּ֗יִם <S%H639><s%> 'ap-Pa-yim, to anger וְרַב־ <S%H7227><s%> ve-rav- and plenteous חֶ֥סֶד <S%H2617><s%> Che-sed in mercy וֶאֱמֶֽת׃ <S%H571><s%> ve-'e-Met. and truth

פְּנֵ֥ה <S%H6437><s%> pe-Neh O turn אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me וְחָ֫נֵּ֥נִי <S%H2603><s%> ve-chon-Ne-ni unto me and have mercy תְּנָֽה־ <S%H5414><s%> te-nah- upon me give עֻזְּךָ֥ <S%H5797><s%> 'uz-ze-Cha thy strength לְעַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> le-'av-De-cha; unto thy servant וְ֝הוֹשִׁ֗יעָה <S%H3467><s%> ve-ho-Shi-'ah, and save לְבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> le-ven- the son אֲמָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H519><s%> 'a-ma-Te-cha. of thine handmaid

עֲשֵֽׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-seh- Shew עִמִּ֥י <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mi with א֗וֹת <S%H226><s%> ot, me a token לְט֫וֹבָ֥ה <S%H2896><s%> le-To-Vah for good וְיִרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> ve-yir-'U me may see שֹׂנְאַ֣י <S%H8130><s%> so-ne-'Ai that they which hate וְיֵבֹ֑שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> ve-ye-Vo-shu; [it] and be ashamed כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Because אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah O יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh because thou LORD עֲזַרְתַּ֥נִי <S%H5826><s%> 'a-zar-Ta-ni hast holpen וְנִחַמְתָּֽנִי׃ <S%H5162><s%> ve-ni-cham-Ta-ni. me and comforted
